attributes.action: Objection against erection of Broiler Chicken Units to hose 333,000+ chickens
attributes.additional_details: To object against the proposed planning application for 6 no. Broiler Chicken Units, to house 333,000+ chickens. This is to be situated on an elevated, beautiful field in a historic, rural hamlet, with serious concerns for safety in accessing and exiting a narrow lane onto the A41.
